statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ 23 \\ -7 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 11 \\ -59 \\ 18 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ 6 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
